global.summary: Rain Rate corresponding to Remote Sensing Systems (RSS) Resampled brightness temperature
global.keywords: EARTH SCIENCE > ATMOSPHERE > PRECIPITATION > PRECIPITATION RATE
global.title: IMERG Rain Rate, resampled to circular Gaussian footprints 0.25 degree Earth grid at satellite overpass times
global.history: Created from on-line IMERG data from the CMR EarthData API
global.source: Huffman, G.J., E.F. Stocker, D.T. Bolvin, E.J. Nelkin, Jackson Tan (2019), GPM IMERG Final Precipitation L3 Half Hourly 0.1 degree x 0.1 degree V06, Greenbelt, MD, Goddard Earth Sciences Data and Information Services Center (GES DISC), 10.5067/GPM/IMERG/3B-HH/06

var.long_name: rainfall rate derived from IMERG Rain product
